oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Harlan Howard - All Time Favorite Country Songwriter
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of Harlan Howard's "All Time Favorite Country Songwriter" album.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Harlan Howard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Heartaches by the Number (Harlan Howard) -- (02:29) Pick Me Up on Your Way Down (Harlan Howard) -- (04:56) I've Got a Tiger by the Tail (Harlan Howard) -- (07:24) Too Many Rivers (Harlan Howard) -- (10:11) I Don't Believe I'll Fall in Love Today (Harlan Howard) -- (12:49) Everglades (Harlan Howard) -- (15:13) Mary Ann Regrets (Harlan Howard) -- (19:00) The Blizzard (Harlan Howard) -- (22:28) Call Me Mister In-Between (Harlan Howard) -- (25:30) Above and Beyond (Harlan Howard) -- (27:20) Busted (Harlan Howard) -- (29:49) I Fall to Pieces (Harlan Howard)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Howard, Harlan;
